hymn.title: I Love Your Word O Jehovah
hymn.category: The Word of God—Loving the Word

layout.singingstanza: I have brought you out of E -- gypt. I've gath -- ered you un -- to My -- self. O Is -- ra -- el how I have loved you! O how much I long to be with you! With my liv -- ing Word I'll in -- fuse you, That you may be one with Me al -- ways. I love Your Word O Je -- ho -- vah! Be -- cause Your Word is just You! Your words in -- fuse me with all that You are— Un -- til I ex -- press on -- ly You.

lyrics.stanza: I have brought you out of Egypt. I've gathered you unto Myself. O Israel how I have loved you! O how much I long to be with you! With my living Word I'll infuse you, That you may be one with Me always.
I love Your Word O Jehovah! Because Your Word is just You! Your words infuse me with all that You are— Until I express only You.
